translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So when the stars are put out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the sky is torn apart,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains are blown away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: are gathered to their appointed time

translations.text: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: for which Day has all this been set?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: This is how We deal with the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: placing it in a secure place
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have We not made the earth a lodging
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: for the living and the dead,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا

translation.text: and We gave you to drink

translations.text: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna feeha rawasiyashamikhatin waasqaynakum maan furata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ

translations.text: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

translations.text: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”<sup foot_note=77580>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

translations.text: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
